fields.book_title: Miller's Dance: A Novel of Cornwall, 1812-1813
fields.summary:
At Nampara, the Poldark family finds the new year brings involvement
in unexpected ventures.

Beautiful color photographs throughout bring this extraordinary
culinary collection to life.

The tumultuous history of Korea unfolds in this compelling story of a
young woman's search for her family roots -- and her own sense of
identity.

Joan is a carer, employed to look after the invalid Nina Rawle, who
has a tangled past in Northern Ireland, in which a single act of
political passion played a destructive role.
